DOC.brief_title: Senior Elastic Band ( SEB ) Institutional Elders
DOC.detailed_description: A three-year , longitudinal , triangulation research method use . The study purpose first year develop safe appropriate SEB program elderly resident long term care facility use Delphi survey panel 12 expert pilot-testing group 15-20 elderly resident long term care facility . In second year study , quasi-experimental , non-equivalent control group design use evaluate effect SEB exercise program physical functional fitness ( cardiovascular-respiratory function , body flexibility , muscle power/muscle endurance , balance ) sleep quality elderly resident long term care facility . Through convenience sampling strategy , total four long term care facility approximately 120 elder Kaohsiung recruit randomly assign base reside facility SEB experimental group waiting-list control group . The subject experimental group receive SEB intervention lead certified instructor , three time per week , 40 minute per practice six month ; subject waiting-list control group remain regular daily activity facility . All subject receive one pre-test two post-tests three month apart study . In third year , elderly participant continue practice SEB guide VCD another nine month , compliance participant toward regular SEB exercise long-term effect physical functional fitness sleep quality outcomes test additional three post-tests , three month apart .
